name: Mega Man Tennis
description:
Mega Man Tennis is a multiplayer arcade game where you face up against another player in an intense match of tennis and emerge as the sole victor.

This game was made over a 2 week period for a school project under UOW Malaysia KDU University College.

How To Win

Swing your racket at the right time and deliver a strong shot. As time passes, you can activate a charged shot that your opponent can barely catch up to.

When the ball enters your opponent's goal, you will earn a score. Win the game by being the first player to earn 15 scores!

Credits

This game is created using Stencyl. All design and programming are done by me.
